programme.title: לעוף על זה (מדובב)
programme.desc: אנימציה. סיפור התבגרות מצחיק ומרתק של גוזל ציפורים קטן ויתום שמעולם לא עזב את הקן, כשלפתע הוא מוצא את עצמו מנהיג משפחת ציפורים נודדות בדרכה לאפריקה. קולות: אורי זלצמן, לירון לב. במאי: כריסטיאן דה ויטה. צרפת/בלגיה, 2014. כ' עב'.(n)

programme.title: גיבורה בהפתעה-טובים ה-2 מן האחד (מדובב)
programme.desc: אנימציה, המשך עלילותיה של מגי הוומבטית הגיבורה. שנה לאחר שהפכה לגיבורה, כעת על מגי וסוויטי לשלב כוחות יחד ולהציל את העיר לאחר שגאון טכנולוגי מרושע מאיים ללכוד את כולם במציאות מדומה "משולמת". דיבוב עב': עדי ארד. 2023.(n)

programme.title: ג'ננה בסוואנה (מדובב)
programme.desc: אנימציה. חיות הג'ונגל בסוואנה האפריקאית מצפות בשקיקה להצפה השנתית של הנהר, שלצערן מתעכבת. בילי הנמייה האמיצה וסוקרטס האריה הפחדן חוברים לחיות נוספות, כדי לגלות מה מקור הבעיה. ד.עב. במאים: ריינהרד קלוס, הולגר טאפה. 2010. כ' עב'.(n)

programme.title: צוות ג'ונגל מטריפים ת'עולם (מדובב)
programme.desc: אנימציה לכל המשפחה. הגיבורים האהובים (והמטורללים) של הג'ונגל חוזרים! קצף ורוד ומוזר מתפשט על פני הג'ונגל ויוצר פיצוצים במגע עם מים. החבורה יוצאת למסע חוצה גלובוס כדי להציל את הג'ונגל, לפני שעונת הגשמים תתחיל. דיבוב עב'. 2023.(n)

programme.title: נורם יוצא לחופשה (מדובב)
programme.desc: הרביעי בסדרת סרטי האנימציה לכל המשפחה, מיוצרי 'צעצוע של סיפור'. נורם, המלך הנערץ של דובי הקוטב יוצא עם משפחתו לחופשה חלומית בסין, שבמהרה משתבשת לאחר שהכתר שלו נעלם באופן מסתורי. דיבוב עב': לורן סביר. 2020. כ' עב'.(n)

programme.title: לא רעים בכלל (מדובב)
programme.desc: אנימציה מדליקה מבית דרימוורקס, ע"פ סדרת הספרים המצליחה. הזאב הרע וחבריו נתפסים על חם בעת ביצוע שוד, אך במקום ללכת לכלא הם מסכימים לעבור שיקום. האם הרעים הגדולים ביותר יכולים להפוך לטובים? דיבוב עב'. 2022. כ' עב'.(n)

programme.title: משפחה בהחלפה (מדובב)
programme.desc: אנימציה. במשפחה זו לכל אחד צרות משלו. ההורים שקועים בעבודות משעממות וכושלות, פיי הבכורה מתאהבת בקלות ומקס החנון סובל מהצקות בבית הספר. חיי המשפחה משתנים כשהם מחליטים לערוך מסיבת תחפושות. במאי: הולגר טאפה, 2017. כ' עב'.(n)

programme.title: שרק לנצח (מדובב)
programme.desc: שרק וחבריו חוזרים להרפתקה חדשה! כשהוא משועמם מחייו, שרק עושה עסקה עם ננס מרושע, ונשאב לעולם מעוות בו פיונה וחבריו מעולם לא נפגשו. כעת שרק עושה הכל כדי להחזיר את העולם לקדמותו. במאי: מייק מיטשל. כ' עב'.(n)

programme.title: אסטריקס ואובליקס: הממלכה התיכונה (מדובב)
programme.desc: קומדיית הרפתקאות. שנת 50 לפנה"ס. בתו היחידה של קיסר סין נמלטת מפני נסיך מושחת שהשתלט על המדינה, ומגיעה במהלך מנוסתה למדינת גאליה. שם היא זוכה להגנה משני הלוחמים האמיצים (אך גם מגושמים), אסטריקס ואובליקס. דיבוב עב'. 2023.(n)

programme.title: העי"ג (ענק ידידותי גדול)-מדובב
programme.desc: סרט ההרפתקאות המקסים שביים סטיבן ספילברג עפ"י ספרו של רואלד דאל. לילה אחד מגיע לחלונה של סופי בת ה-10 בבית יתומים יצור ענק. למרות החשש הראשוני, היא מצטרפת לענק הידידותי למסע קסום. 2016. כ' עב'.(n)

programme.title: טרולים 3: הקול טוב
programme.desc: אנימציה מוזיקלית, השלישי בסדרת הסרטים המצליחה. פופי מגלה שבילדותו בראנץ' היה חלק מלהקת אחים מפורסמת. לאחר שכנועים החבורה יוצאת להרפתקה מוזיקלית מטורפת לאחד את להקת האחים האבודים. דיבוב: אנה קנדריק, ג'סטין טימברלייק. 2023.(n)

programme.title: השידורים יתחדשו בקרוב
programme.desc: השידורים יתחדשו בקרוב.(n)

programme.title: ה. ב''ש - ע. טבריה

programme.title: צ'לסי - פולהאם
programme.desc: שידור חוזר: כדורגל. צ'לסי - פולהאם, הליגה האנגלית, מחזור 3, עונת 2025/26. אחרי ההצגה במחזור הקודם, הבלוז רוצים עוד 3 נקודות בדרבי לונדוני.(n)

programme.desc: שידור חוזר: כדורגל. מנצ'סטר יונייטד - ברנלי, הליגה האנגלית, מחזור 3, עונת 2025/26. השדים האדומים עם קוניה ואמבואמו מחפשים ניצחון ראשון העונה.(n)

programme.title: וואלה! תיקתקנו - מבזק ספורט

programme.title: ראיון מיוחד עם סול קמפבל
programme.desc: שידור חוזר: כדורגל. שליח ספורט 1 באנגליה, ניב דברת, פוגש את סול קמפבל, שנזכר במעבר מטוטנהאם לארסנל, ציפיות מהקבוצות לעונה, דירוג בלמים ומה הוא חושב על הציון שלו בפיפ''א?(n)

programme.title: The Great Escape
programme.desc: The most rebellious Allied prisoners of war are sent to a supposedly escape-proof maximum-security detention camp during the Second World War. programme.title: Freud's Last Session

Comedy drama, starring Paul Newman, Dylan Walsh, Bruce Willis and Melanie Griffith.(n)

programme.title: The Fisher King
programme.desc: A radio DJ contemplates suicide after a listener embarks on a murderous rampage in response to one of his broadcasts. When the DJ later learns that he is responsible for his saviour's misfortunes, he feels compelled to make amends. Terry Gilliam's comedy drama, with Robin Williams, Jeff Bridges, Amanda Plummer and Mercedes Ruehl.(n)

programme.title: Bob Marley: One Love
programme.desc: In 1976, Jamaica is dangerously divided across political lines and musician Bob Marley vows to quell the violence by performing at the Smile Jamaica Concert. Two days before the high-profile gig, gunmen break into the singer's home, shooting Bob, his wife Rita and manager Don Taylor. Everyone survives and Marley moves to London with his entourage to begin work on the LP Exodus under Island Records supremo Chris Blackwell. Biographical drama, starring Kingsley Ben-Adir, Lashana Lynch and James Norton.

programme.title: Lee

programme.title: The Money Pit
programme.desc: New York couple Tom Hanks and Shelley Long find what seems like the perfect house, but before long they've been sucked into a renovation nightmare. Fun comedy.

programme.title: Weird Science
programme.desc: Cult John Hughes comedy. Two teens build the perfect woman on their PC. Bill Paxton and Robert Downey Jr star. Contains discriminatory content and flashing images.

programme.title: Brewster's Millions
programme.desc: Can Richard Pryor spend $30m in a month without buying a thing? Sure, if it's going to net him $300m! Riches to rags comedy with John Candy.

programme.title: Sixteen Candles
programme.desc: A girl's sixteenth birthday goes awry when her family forgets about it. 1980s John Hughes coming-of-age comedy. Language/sex/mature themes.

programme.title: Ferris Bueller's Day Off
programme.desc: While Matthew Broderick skips school and has the day off to die for, Principal Ed Rooney tries to catch him out. Classic 80s comedy from John Hughes. Strong language.

programme.title: The Golden Child
programme.desc: Eddie Murphy stars as the social worker who is given the task of protecting a magical child from those who seek to control the universe. Contains strong language/violence.

programme.title: Parenthood
programme.desc: Funny and perceptive comedy-drama about the trials and tribulations of parenthood. With Steve Martin, Mary Steenburgen, Keanu Reeves and Rick Moranis.

programme.title: Twins
programme.desc: Two unlikely brothers reunite after years apart to seek out their long-lost mother. Comedy with Danny DeVito. Moderate language/sexual references/stereo sound only.

programme.title: 48 Hrs.
programme.desc: Grizzled cop Nick Nolte and wiseass crook Eddie Murphy clash when they're thrown together to catch a killer. Action comedy hit. Contains strong language/sex/violence.

programme.title: See No Evil, Hear No Evil
programme.desc: Comedy starring Gene Wilder as a deaf news-stand owner, who is framed for murder with his blind assistant. Language/mature themes/flashing images/discriminatory content.

programme.title: Beverly Hills Cop
programme.desc: Streetwise Detroit detective Eddie Murphy pursues a colleague's killer to LA, causing mayhem for local cop Judge Reinhold. Action comedy.

programme.desc: Long-nosed fire chief Steve Martin falls for astronomer Daryl Hannah, but his eccentric looks make him too shy to make a move. Comedy retelling of Cyrano de Bergerac.

programme.desc: On an empty road in the middle of the night, Shula stumbles across the body of her uncle. As the funeral unfolds, the cousins unveil the buried secrets of their Zambian family in a vibrant reckoning with the lies we tell ourselves.

programme.title: Martha Marcy May Marlene

programme.desc: When new DNA evidence leads to Springsteen and Scott's release, the victims' families must grapple with the unknown.

programme.title: The Perks of Being a Wallflower
programme.desc: Socially awkward Charlie is a wallflower watching from the sidelines, until a pair of charismatic seniors take him under their wing.

programme.desc: Imprisoned within the Great Wall of China, a mercenary warrior (Matt Damon) joins forces with an elite army to battle an onslaught of marauding monsters.

programme.title: Silver Linings Playbook
programme.desc: An unexpected bond begins to form between a man trying to rebuild his life and a young woman promising to help him reunite with his estranged wife.

programme.title: The Yogurt Shop Murders
programme.desc: When new DNA evidence leads to Springsteen and Scott's release, the victims' families must grapple with the unknown.

programme.title: Lyle, Lyle, Crocodile
programme.desc: When the Primm family moves to New York City, their young son, Josh, struggles to adapt to his new school and new friends. All of that changes when he discovers Lyle, a singing crocodile that loves baths, caviar and great music.

programme.title: The Legend of Ochi
programme.desc: In a remote village on the island of Carpathia, a shy farm girl named Yuri is raised to fear elusive animals known as ochi. But when Yuri discovers a wounded baby ochi has been left behind, she escapes on a quest to bring him home.

programme.title: The Yogurt Shop Murders

programme.title: A Kind of Murder
programme.desc: An unhappily married man (Patrick Wilson) becomes fascinated by the case of a man (Eddie Marsan) suspected of murdering his wife and begins to imagine what it would be like to murder his own wife.

programme.title: I Know This Much Is True
programme.desc: After paranoid schizophrenic Thomas Birdsey has a violent breakdown, his twin, Dominick, finds himself stepping up to defend Thomas in unexpected ways; Dominick reflects on their childhood growing up under the tyrannical rule of their stepfather.

programme.title: I Know This Much Is True
programme.desc: Tensions arise between Dominick and his girlfriend, Joy, as the media takes an interest in Thomas' case; Dominick finds a potential ally in social worker Lisa Sheffer but clashes with Thomas' psychiatrist, Dr. Patel, as she probes into his past.

programme.title: I Know This Much Is True
programme.desc: Lisa Sheffer preps Dominick for a hearing with Hatch's review board that could decide Thomas' fate; an encounter with an old classmate brings painful childhood memories to the surface; Dominick reflects on his and Thomas' time together at college.

programme.title: I Know This Much Is True
programme.desc: Dominick returns to work before fully recovering from his accident; heavily medicated, Dominick recalls the disturbing incident that led to Thomas' first hospitalization while counting down the hours to Thomas' hearing with the Hatch review board.

programme.title: I Know This Much Is True
programme.desc: Upon learning the details of his Sicilian grandfather's arrival in the early 1900s to Three Rivers, Dominick becomes convinced his family is cursed; a startling update on Thomas from an unlikely source prompts Dominick to take drastic action.

programme.title: I Know This Much Is True
programme.desc: A lifetime of animosity between Dominick and Ray spills over in public at an inopportune time; after an unexpected tragedy, Dominick seeks reconciliation with those he has hurt; Dominick gets answers.

programme.title: The Conjuring
programme.desc: Paranormal investigators Lorraine (Vera Farmiga) and Ed (Patrick Wilson) Warren confront a powerful demonic entity when they try to help parents and children being terrorized in their secluded farmhouse.

programme.title: The Conjuring 2

programme.title: It

programme.title: It: Chapter Two
programme.desc: Defeated by members of the Losers' Club, the evil clown Pennywise returns 27 years later to terrorize the town of Derry, Maine. Now adults, the united Losers must conquer their deepest fears to destroy the shape-shifting Pennywise once and for all.

programme.title: The Outsider
programme.desc: Ralph admits to being baffled by conflicting physical evidence; an unexpected tragedy throws the investigation into a tailspin; Glory tries to soothe her daughter Jessa, who says she's been visited by a strange man in her room at night.

programme.title: The Outsider

programme.title: The Outsider

programme.desc: Holly tries to help a volatile but conflicted Jack, while their whereabouts are being tracked by Ralph and Alec; after she's confronted by gossip, Glory considers Howie's suggestion on how to secure her family's financial future.

programme.title: The Outsider
programme.desc: Sensing something ominous afoot, Claude reconnects with his brother in Tennessee, while Holly, Ralph, Yunis, and Andy follow him in hopes of isolating the evil force and thwarting its next kill; a visiting family avoids a dangerous encounter.

programme.title: The Outsider
programme.desc: After obscuring their true purpose in town from local police, Ralph and Yunis interview witnesses from the cave festival, while Holly and Andy visit the scene; later, the group considers its next move as Claude deals with the weight of his role.

programme.title: The Outsider
programme.desc: The group finds itself in a climactic showdown in their last-ditch effort to root out El Coco.

programme.title: The Silence of the Lambs
programme.desc: An FBI trainee (Jodie Foster) seeks advice from a brilliant, psychopathic prisoner (Anthony Hopkins) to catch a killer who skins his victims.

programme.title: Hannibal
programme.desc: Seven years have passed since Dr. Hannibal Lecter (Anthony Hopkins) escaped from custody. The doctor is now at large in Europe. Mason Verger (Gary Oldman) remembers Lecter too, and is obsessed with revenge.

programme.title: The Legend of Ochi
programme.desc: In a remote village on the island of Carpathia, a shy farm girl named Yuri is raised to fear elusive animals known as ochi. But when Yuri discovers a wounded baby ochi has been left behind, she escapes on a quest to bring him home.

programme.title: The Meg
programme.desc: A massive creature attacks a deep-sea submersible, leaving it disabled and trapping the crew at the bottom of the Pacific Ocean. With time running out, a rescue diver must now confront an unimaginable threat -- a 75-foot-long prehistoric shark.

programme.title: Hot Tub Time Machine 2
programme.desc: The magical hot tub sends Lou (Rob Corddry), Nick (Craig Robinson) and Jacob (Clark Duke) to the year 2025 to prevent an unknown assailant from shooting Lou.

programme.title: The Three Stooges
programme.desc: Knuckleheads Larry (Sean Hayes), Curly (Will Sasso) and Moe (Chris Diamantopoulos) become embroiled in a murder plot and stumble into starring roles in a TV reality show while trying to save their childhood home.

programme.title: Carrie
programme.desc: A social misfit (Sissy Spacek) with psychic powers wreaks havoc at her prom to get even with pranksters.

programme.title: Companion
programme.desc: A weekend getaway at a remote cabin turns to chaos when it's revealed that one of the guests -- a subservient android built for human companionship -- has gone haywire.

programme.title: Cleaner
programme.desc: Radical activists take 300 hostages at an energy company's annual gala in a high-rise building. It's now up to a former soldier who works as a window cleaner to save the hostages trapped inside, including her younger brother.

programme.title: Spaceballs
programme.desc: President Skroob (Mel Brooks) pits evil Dark Helmet (Rick Moranis) against Lone Starr and the half-man, half-dog Barf (John Candy).

programme.title: Couples Retreat
programme.desc: Four couples find that paradise comes at a price when they must participate in therapy sessions at a tropical resort.

programme.title: The Big Lebowski
programme.desc: Bowling buddies become involved with a multimillionaire and his family wanted by mobsters in 1990s Los Angeles.

programme.title: Napoleon Dynamite
programme.desc: A gawky teenager from an odd family helps his new friend run for class president against a popular student.

programme.title: Fast & Furious
programme.desc: Brian O'Conner, back working for the FBI in Los Angeles, teams up with Dominic Toretto to bring down a heroin importer by infiltrating his operation.

programme.title: Mad Money
programme.desc: Three women (Diane Keaton, Queen Latifah, Katie Holmes) conspire to steal a pile of cash that the Federal Reserve Bank has earmarked for destruction.

programme.title: Hellboy
programme.desc: A demon raised from infancy after being conjured by and rescued from the Nazis, grows up to become a defender against the forces of darkness.

programme.title: Babygirl
programme.desc: A high-powered CEO puts her career and family on the line when she begins a torrid affair with her much younger intern.

programme.title: The Double
programme.desc: An awkward office drone (Jesse Eisenberg) becomes increasingly unhinged after a charismatic and confident look-alike takes a job at his workplace and seduces the woman (Mia Wasikowska) he desires.

programme.title: Morgan
programme.desc: Scientists at a remote, top-secret facility find themselves in a dangerous lockdown with an unpredictable and violent bioengineered child (Anya Taylor-Joy).

programme.title: War on Everyone
programme.desc: Two corrupt cops, who make money blackmailing criminals, come up against one who may be far more dangerous than both of them.

programme.title: A Different Man
programme.desc: Aspiring actor Edward undergoes a radical medical procedure to drastically transform his appearance. But his new dream face turns into a nightmare as he becomes obsessed with reclaiming what he lost.

programme.title: Where the Crawdads Sing
programme.desc: When a man is found dead, a woman who lives by herself in the dangerous marshlands of North Carolina becomes the main suspect. As the case unfolds, the verdict as to what happened becomes increasingly unclear, threatening to reveal many secrets.

programme.title: Criminal
programme.desc: Hoping to stop a diabolical plot, the CIA implants the memories and skills of a dead agent (Ryan Reynolds) into the mind of a dangerous convict (Kevin Costner).

programme.title: Public Enemies
programme.desc: Depression-era outlaw John Dillinger (Johnny Depp) becomes the fledgling FBI's most-wanted criminal and a folk hero to much of America's downtrodden public.

programme.title: Last Stop Larrimah
programme.desc: Nestled deep in the Australian Outback is the town of Larrimah and its 11 eccentric residents. When one of them mysteriously disappears into thin air, the remaining residents become suspects and a long history of infighting is unveiled.

programme.title: The Mortician
programme.desc: After David Sconce takes over his family's mortuary business, a local funeral director makes shocking allegations about the crematorium.

programme.title: The Mortician
programme.desc: HD. David expands the business as allegations of abuse mount. Following his arrest, shocking evidence is discovered in the death of a rival.

programme.title: The Mortician
programme.desc: Members of the Lamb family are convicted of various crimes, including fraud; while in prison, a murder charge is brought against David for the death of his competitor.
